title: Masjid is 5 minutes away but we don't hear the adhan, must we attend the prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: germany the masjid is five minutes away we don't hear the adhan you don't have to hear the adam the distance which a normal person on top of the roof of the masjid there are no obstacles or concrete buildings or cars or whatever no obstacles and he calls the athan with the loud voice how much would his voice travel this is the distance that you should if you live within the vicinity to attend the prayer five minutes you must pray in the masjid abdul hakim
